depth.name: depth
depth.description: limit the depth of nodes in response

fields.name: fields
fields.description: optionally identify specific data nodes in response

filter.name: filter
filter.description: xpath expression to filter data nodes in response

insert.name: insert
insert.description: controlling the order when adding new list elements

point.name: point
point.description: used to specify the insertion point

sr-policies-head-end.name: sr-policies-head-end
sr-policies-head-end.description: The IP address of the SR policy source.

sr-policies-end-point.name: sr-policies-end-point
sr-policies-end-point.description: The IP address of the SR policy destination.

sr-policies-color.name: sr-policies-color
sr-policies-color.description: The color for the SR policy.

results-head-end.name: results-head-end
results-head-end.description: The IP address of the SR policy source.

results-end-point.name: results-end-point
results-end-point.description: The IP address of the SR policy destination.

results-color.name: results-color
results-color.description: The color for the SR policy.

interfaces-node.name: interfaces-node
interfaces-node.description: The hostname of the source-node for the interface

interface-sr-policies-node.name: interface-sr-policies-node
interface-sr-policies-node.description: The hostname of the source-node for the interface

igp-route-node.name: igp-route-node
igp-route-node.description: The hostname of the source-node for the interface

hops-step.name: hops-step
hops-step.description: The representation of the hop order in the path.

ietf-restconf:yang-library-version.description: This leaf identifies the revision date of the 'ietf-yang-library' YANG module that is implemented by this server. See RESTCONF RFC 8040 for further information.

ietf-restconf:restconf.description: This is the RESTCONF root resource for the RESTCONF datastore and operation resources. See RESTCONF RFC 8040 for further information.
